short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export your progress on a Memrise community course.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension lets you save your Memrise community course's progress, so that you can import it into another site, such as mylittlewordland.com or deckademy.com

To download your progress:
1. Go to https://community-courses.memrise.com
2. Open a course. You should now be on the course's overview page.
3. Click the blue "Export progress" button.
